topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53aa21226368726d0f370100#post_53aa21226368726d0f370100
I actually don't like Grave of the Fireflies. Wait wait! Don't kill me for my heresy yet, let me explain.

The movie is quite well made and it does indeed make me cry like a bitch every time I watch it. Not that that is any great feat.

My problem with it lies in its purpose, which is essentially "listen up you little shits, how dare you not devote your life to everything your elders think say and do, we had a hard time when our government was trying to conquer the world!"

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53aa3c186368722584100100#post_53aa3c186368722584100100

I suppose that fair.

And I need something to get not-frustrated into, like one of Ubisoft's older titles: Farcry.

As "alright" of a game it is, it's starting to wear. Especially the river level I'm at now. Of course, my want to rush the game may not be doing the best, I could do it better maybe if I went slower. But by God, I think I'm so close to the end game I got to go fast! I got to work up to FarCry 3!
